revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt. Coronet North |image = [[File:Mt. Coronet North.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Mt. Coronet North. |tokens = 74,500 |location = Mt. Coronet Megadungeon, the absolute top of the 'mountain range' in the middle of the map. }} '''Mt. Coronet North''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 1,111,500 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Clefairy.png|40px]] Clefairy || rowspan=11 colspan=2 | <center> N/A |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop |- | [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Noctowl.png|40px]] Noctowl |- | [[File:Meditite.png|40px]] Meditite |- | [[File:Barboach.png|40px]] Barboach |- | [[File:Chingling.png|40px]] Chingling |- | [[File:Bronzor.png|40px]] Bronzor |- | [[File:Snover.png|40px]] Snover |}

<tab name="Debuff"> After reaching [[Alola]], the drop chance for items will be [[Dungeons#Dungeon Loot Regional Debuff|debuffed]].
